Question: This person was among Time magazine's 100 Most Important People of the Century.
Hints: A year and a half later, this person gave birth to her second child, Desiderio Alberto Arnaz IV, known as Desi Arnaz, Jr.
In 1951, this person was instrumental in the creation of the television series I Love Lucy.
This person later said about that time in her life, "All I learned in drama school was how to be frightened.".
